title: What is a Tensor
dc:creator: mlopezm
description: This Youtube reproduction list is a fantastic place to understand what is a Tensor. It goes all the way to explain how tensors are defined. It starts from vectors, linear maps, dual spaces, tensor product and finally they arrive to the definition of tensors. Very clear!!
content:encoded:
This Youtube reproduction list is a fantastic place to understand what is a Tensor.

It goes all the way to explain how tensors are defined. It starts from vectors, linear maps, dual spaces, tensor product and finally they arrive to the definition of tensors.

Very clear!!
